channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Smart Slider 3
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Smart Slider 3

item.title: CVE-2023-0660|2023-03-27T15:37:19.768Z -- unknown -- smart%20slider%203
item.description: The Smart Slider 3 WordPress plugin before 3.5.1.14 does not properly validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
